column2: Gene family expansion analysis. Orthogroups, demonstrating fivefold or higher expansion insubtidal versus  intertidal species
Columns B to F represent standard BLASTn output (http://www.metagenomics.wiki/tools/blast/blastn-output-format-6)
Columns G to M are fragment from Proteinortho output
ratio_ts - ratio between mean number of functional copies of orthologs found in group of intertidal (L.balthica and M.arenaria) and tidal (H.arctica, A.islandica and M.calcarea) species
Files Aislandica_prot.fa, Harctica_prot.fa, Marenaria_prot.fa, Mbalthica_prot.fa, Mcalcarea_prot.fa are available at https://github.com/ZaTaxon/Mcalcarea_transcriptome/data
